oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Novel high contrast electrochromic polymer materials based on 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAHOO, R
MISHRA, SP
KUMAR, A
SINDHU, S
RAO, KN
GOPAL, ESR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: poly(3,4-alkylenedioxythiophene) derivatives
visible region
ratios
electrochromic polymers
poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (pedot)
poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) derivatives
poly( 3 4-propylenedioxythiophene) (pprodot)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mono and di allyl and napthyl substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophenes were synthesized and polymerized electrochemically. All the monomers were characterized for their molecular structures, and the polymers were characterized for their electrochemical properties. The disubstituted derivatives showed higher contrast than the corresponding mono substituted derivatives. The allyl substituted polymers showed higher contrast and faster switching time than corresponding napthyl substituted derivatives. The presence of the allyl group as the pendant can be used for further functionalization of the polymer. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 4th International Symposium on Laser, Scintillator and Nonlinear Optical Materials,Prague, CZECH REPUBLIC,JUN 27-30, 2006
